snippet: ROBERTS--Nancy G.,formerly of Westbury, NY, died on Saturday, January 30th at Cape Cod Hospital in Hyannis, MA after a brief illness. She was 79. Born in Brooklyn, New York, Nancy was the wife of the late Arthur Roberts. Prior to her retirement in 2005, Mrs. Roberts had worked as a guidance counselor in the New York City Public School System for nearly 40 years, working in several schools during her career, including P.S. 1 and P.S. 41 in Manhattan. Mrs. Roberts earned her undergraduate degree from Fordham University and a Master's Degree in Education from New York University. She is survived by her son, Charles Roberts, her brother, John Gerardi and a sister, Kathleen Wicks. She was predeceased by her daughter Roanna Roberts in 2013. If desired, memorial donations in Nancy's name may be made to the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society, the Soup Kitchen in Provincetown or the Provincetown Rescue Squad. 1/3
